title.value: Ресурсоэнергосберегающий режим орошения овощных культур и многолетних трав на дерново-подзолистых почвах Беларуси
Resourcesaving mode for vegetables and perennial grasses on sod-podzol soils of Belarus

journal.title: Land Reclamation : scientific and practical journal

person.name: Oskirko, L.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented a report on improved calculation methods of project irrigation mode. It is proved that the preservation while watering with overhead irrigation of backup capacity, intended for intake and keeping of fall out precipitation during vegetation, is an effective method which helps to use water resources rationally. Calculations show that on the average, while watering at the expense of saving backup capacity, 10-15 % of irrigation water is economized during vegetation in soil and proportional amount of energy is saved for water feed from irrigation head to the filed.
